s: Aerosmith is an American rock band, sometimes referred to as "the Bad Boys from Boston" and "America's Greatest Rock n Roll Band". Aerosmith was formed in Boston, Massachusetts in 1970. I like this CD of Aerosmith because it has numerous songs that were big hits for them. However the first CD was defective, kept giving me CD error messages & would do it no matter what I tried. Amazon did honor returning it even though it was 2 days outside of the 30 free return policy.
